Class AdminService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.AdminService
public class AdminService extends Object
Service class for Admin role functionality. Handles administrative tasks such as approving gym owner/customer registrations, gym center approvals, and viewing system-wide statistics.
Author:
team IOTA
